name: Meika Hime's Amazing Virtual Idol Debut!
name_original: Meika Hime's Amazing Virtual Idol Debut!
description:
Meika Hime is an up and coming virtual idol star. She works hard to reach her fame. However, she sleeps through a practice session one day and her sister's nowhere around the studio. There's a bright light... and suddenly she's on a big stage!
Eeeeeeh?

A six trillion trivia quiz show with the most famous virtual idol Hatsune Miku?

How will the day turn out?

And what is that under the cheery quiz BGM?

---

"Meika Hime's Amazing Virtual Idol Debut" is a very short story created to introduce Vocaloid and commemorate a certain event in the community. 
This almost kinetic VN is an entry to Genshiken Game Division's April 2019 Gamejam for the prompt 'Idol', containing copyrighted materials listed below. The complete listing of credits is as follows:
